RESOLUTION

In the name of the Russian Federation

2 March 2020 year                                 g. Perm

Perm regional court of Perm region

As part of the presiding judge Bratchikovoj M.P.,

when Secretary Konyshevoj EA,

with the participation of the defendant Petrova K.AND.,

examined in open court a civil case under the claim Joint Stock Company «YuniKredit Bank» to Petrovu FULL NAME7 on recovery credit Debt, foreclosure of the mortgaged property,

ESTABLISHED:

JSC «YuniKredit bank» It appealed to the court to Petrovu K.AND. for the recovery of debts on credit contract, foreclosure of the mortgaged property, the recovery of legal costs.

In support of the requirements specified, that DD.MM.YYYY Petrov K.AND. and JSC «YuniKredit Bank» by signing declaration provision avtokredita signed a credit agreement № whereby Bank provided respondent loan for a period of, specified in statement. In accordance with credit agreement defendant security execution of credit agreement handed the bank pledge car Lexus RX 350, VIN №, Title (PSM) №. cost the collateral parties defined in 1 900 000 RUB. defendant until now monetary obligations to pay credit Debt not fulfilled, that vynudilo claimant go to court. As of DD.MM.YYYY debt defendant made 1471482,29 RUB., including: arrears on principal 1396100,59 RUB., arrears of interest for credit 45504,34 RUB., arrears of interest, assessed on delay principal 20195,99 RUB., arrears of shtrafnym interest 9681,37 RUB. Requests to recover from the defendant specified amount of debt, to foreclose on the mortgaged property, to recover the costs of paying state duties of 21557,41 RUB.

claimant the time and place of the court duly notified of the meeting, representative at the hearing is not sent, It submitted an application for examination of the case without the participation of a representative of.

defendant Petrov K.AND. at the hearing objected meet the stated requirements on the grounds, that violation liabilities due difficult financial situation, now takes measures to maturity arrears.

the court which after hearing defendant, examining the case file, comes to the following conclusion.

DD.MM.YYYY Petrovym K.AND. zapolnena statement-questionnaire in JSC «YuniKredit Bank» for a loan to acquire car worth 2000000 RUB. with original vznosom 600 000 rubles, for 60 months (l.d.27-30).

DD.MM.YYYY Petrov K.AND. zapolnil statement individual for consideration opportunities loan in JSC «YuniKredit Bank» for the purchase of vehicle (l.d.26).

DD.MM.YYYY JSC «YuniKredit Bank» and Petrov K.M. signed individual terms of an agreement consumer credit. loan amount made 1561758,24 RUB., credit available up to DD.MM.YYYY. agreement valid until date repayment of loan full. interest rate loan made 14,90 %, repayment of principal loan and payment accrued his amount of interest made by the borrower on a monthly basis equal annuitentnymi installments 15 day of each month. on the date conclusion of the contract monthly of payment is equal to 37073 RUB. The Borrower shall transferred to pledge the bank TC in software proper performance borrower the obligation to repay Loans and other monetary obligations under contract. Zaemnye tools used borrower for payment parts value purchased borrower Ltd. at «Auto-Trade Ural» TC with the following individual features: Lexus RX 350, VIN №, year release 2013. Podpisaniem real individual of conditions borrower confirms that the general terms and conditions him awarded and clear, borrower with them I agree, and admits that the contract for loan purchase vehicle pledge It consists of real individual terms of contract consumer credit and general of conditions. borrower transmits pledge the bank the car with setting agreed the cost of the car in the amount of 1900000 RUB. in software proper performance the borrower obligations repayment of loan and other obligations under the contract (l.d.31-34,36-37).

general terms of an agreement consumer credit on current costs govern the relationship between the borrower and JSC «YuniKredit Bank», arising about of Bank consumer credit on current costs. general conditions with signed borrower individual conditions up contract for the provision loan. date enrollment loan expense It is date loan. under debt loan understood aggregate amount the debt of the borrower on principal, assessed, but neuplachennym interest, and the sum of penalty. For the use of loan borrowers pays monthly the bank interest as charged rate, specified in individual conditions of. The Borrower shall refund the bank loan and pay interest for credit use the manner and conditions, stipulated in the contract, as well as refund the bank all costs bank, the debt enforcement under contract. The Bank is entitled ahead of schedule reclaim with the borrower all sum Debt on the loan order and terms, statutory, if the borrower does not implemented repayment of principal loan and/or percent in the amount of and terms, established by the agreement. when untimely repayment of contract the borrower pays the bank a penalty fee 20% APR, accrued on sum arrears on loan for the period date, where corresponding the amount to be payable, the date her actual payment Bank inclusively (l.d.57).

DD.MM.YYYY the plaintiff against the defendant sent a letter with the requirement to repay payable under the credit agreement by DD.MM.YYYY during 30 days after directions Bank present requirements (l.d.25).

Taking into account defined circumstances, the court finds that the validity of the stated requirements.

This conclusion of the Court based on volume, that by virtue of Article. 309 Of the Civil Code obligations must be fulfilled appropriately in accordance with the the obligations and requirements of the law, other legal acts.

On the basis of paragraph.1 Article. 809 of the Civil Code, unless otherwise provided by law or loan agreement, the lender is entitled to interest from the borrower in the amount of loan amounts and order of, certain contract.

In accordance with paragraph. 2 Article. 811 Of the Civil Code if the loan agreement It provides for the return of the loan in installments (by installments), then the borrower violates the deadline, set to return to the next part a loan, the lender has the right to demand early repayment throughout the remainder of the loan amount together with interest due.

Under the provisions of Article. 819 Civil Code of the Russian Federation on a credit agreement bank (lender) is obliged to provide funds to the borrower in the terms and conditions, stipulated in the contract, and the borrower agrees to repay the a sum of money and pay interest for her. The relations of the credit agreement the rules, provided for in paragraph 1 head 42 of the Civil Code, unless otherwise provided by the rules Article.Article. 819-821 The Civil Code and does not follow from the nature of the loan agreement.

Federal Law of 21.12.2013 N 353-FZ (ed. from 03.07.2016) "Oh potrebitelskom kredite (zajme)" also subject to application to legal disputes, since It entered into force 01.07.2014 year it established that agreement consumer credit (a loan) It consists of general conditions and individual of conditions. agreement consumer credit (a loan) may contain elements other treaties (mixed agreement), if it does not contradict present Federal law. K terms of the contract consumer credit (a loan), except of conditions, agreed creditor and the borrower in accordance with Paragraph 9 this Article, applicable article 428 Civil Code of the Russian Federation. general terms of an agreement consumer credit (a loan) established creditor unilaterally in order to mnogokratnogo applications. violation borrower terms of return principal and (or) payment of interest on contract consumer credit (a loan) entails responsibility, installed federal law, agreement consumer credit (a loan), as well as the emergence of a lender rights demand early repayment of the entire remaining amounts consumer credit (a loan) with entitlements under contract consumer credit (a loan) interest and (or) termination of the contract consumer credit (a loan) when, provided by this Article (articles 5,14).From the presented calculation, payable to the defendant Bank of of 04.06.2019 is 1471482,29 RUB., including: arrears on principal 1396100,59 RUB., arrears of interest for credit 45504,34 RUB., arrears of interest, assessed on delay principal 20195,99 RUB., arrears of shtrafnym interest 9681,37 RUB. (l.d.8,9,10-13).

since Petrovym K.AND. received credit, thus it allowed improper execution the obligations assumed by making payments on account his repayment and payment percent, expressed in violation timing of annuitentnogo monthly payment and in failure Acting on loan repayment, in connection with which it was formed above debt, the court finds volume, that produced calculation It is arithmetically true, accordingly the conditions of the loan agreement, in this connection arrears on principal and interest for credit It is recovered in full.

considering the amount of debt, the period of delay, the plaintiff size nestojki, the court finds volume, that the grounds for application of the provisions of Article. 333 Civil Code of the Russian Federation in parts reducing the penalty amount no.

according to Office of the Ministry of Interior of Russia g. Perm vehicle Lexus RX 350, VIN № It belongs by right of ownership Petrovu K.AND.

According to paragraph. 1 Article. 334 Civil Code of the Russian Federation (hereinafter the Civil Code) by virtue of the pledge creditor the secured obligation (mortgagee) It has the right in case of default or improper performance by the debtor this obligation to obtain satisfaction from the value of the mortgaged property (the collateral) prior to other creditors of the person, It belongs mortgaged property (mortgagor).

In accordance with Article. 337 of the Civil Code, unless otherwise provided by law or contract, pledge provides requirement the extent, which it has a a moment of satisfaction, in particular interest as penalty, damages, caused delay in performance, as well as compensation necessary expenses pledgee for the maintenance of the collateral and associated with appeal foreclosure on the collateral and his realization costs.

In accordance with Article. 340 of the Civil Code cost the collateral It is determined by agreement between the parties, unless otherwise provided by law. Unless otherwise provided by law, by agreement or court decision to foreclose on the mortgaged the property that soglasovannaya parties cost the collateral recognized at the cost of implementation (initial sale at the cost of) the collateral handling on him foreclosure.

In accordance with Article. 348 The Civil Code foreclose on the mortgaged property to satisfy the requirements mortgagee can be reversed in the case of non-performance or improper performance by the debtor secured liabilities (n. 1).

Enforcement of mortgaged property not allowed, if admitted debtor violation secured liabilities insignificantly and size the pledgee thereby is clearly disproportionate the value of the mortgaged property. Unless It is proven otherwise, had assumed violation secured liabilities insignificantly and size the pledgee is clearly disproportionate the value of the mortgaged property provided they at the same time met The following conditions:

1) sum unsettled obligations is less than than five percent size the value of the mortgaged property;

2) the period of delay in execution obligations as secured, is less than than three of the month (n. 2).

If the contract pledge not otherwise provided for, execution upon property, mortgaged for commitment, ispolnyaemogo periodicheskimi payments, It is allowed systematic violation of terms their application, that is, when violation of terms making payments more than three times during twelve months, preceding the date of to court or date directions notification foreclosure of the mortgaged property extrajudicially, even at condition that the each delay slight (n. 3).

debtor and It is third person mortgagor the right to terminate any time prior to implementation the collateral an appeal on a it foreclosure and his implementation, ispolniv obespechennoe pledge commitment or the portion thereof, performance where prosrocheno. agreement, ogranichivayushhee this right, nichtozhno (n. 4).

In accordance with paragraph. 1 Article. 350 of the Civil Code realization mortgaged property, on which collection drawn on the basis of a court decision, It is carried out by public sale in order, established by this Code and Procedure laws, unless the law or agreement between the pledgee and pledger has not established that realization the collateral carried out in order, established abzatsami second and third item 2 articles 350.1 this Code.

Taking into account, in violation terms of contract consumer credit defendant Petrov K.AND. March 2018 year makes payments repayment FULL NAME2 and interest for the use of credit in violation of the terms of the loan agreement, in this connection by of DD.MM.YYYY the defendant was formed arrears in loan to the plaintiff JSC «YuniKredit Bank» at the rate of 1471482,29 rubles, said debt the defendant has not been canceled, the court finds the plaintiff's claim on the foreclosure of the subject of mortgage vehicle stamps Lexus RX 350, VIN №, year release 2013, by sale at public auction grounded.

Grounds for refusal foreclosure of the mortgaged property, provided for by Article 348 of the Civil Code, the court is not established, since together of conditions, determining littleness infringement secured liabilities and disproportion size requirements pledgee the value of the mortgaged property, in the present case is not there is.

In accordance with Part. 1 Article. 88 Civil Procedure Code of the Russian Federation (further - Code of Civil Procedure of the Russian Federation) legal costs consist of state fees and costs, of the proceedings.

Based on hours.1 Article.98 GIC RF side, in whose favor the decision court, Court awards to compensate the other All the parties in the case incurred legal expenses, for cases provided for by Article 96 this Code. in case the if the claim is partially satisfied, referred to in this article, the court costs awarded to the claimant in proportion satisfied by the court of claims, and in proportion to the part of the defendant claims, in which the plaintiff is denied.

according to payment orders № from DD.MM.YYYY for filing a claim the plaintiff paid the state fee size 21557,41 rubles (l.d.7), that meets the requirements of Article. 91 Code of Civil Procedure of the Russian Federation, Article. 333.19 Tax Code of the Russian Federation.

Since claims the plaintiff shall be met, the Court considers it necessary to on the basis of Article. 98 Code of Civil Procedure of the Russian Federation recover from the defendant Petrova K.AND. the plaintiff costs payment of the fee in the amount of 21 557,41 rubles.

Based on the aforesaid and guided Article.Article. 194-198,199 Civil Procedure Code, court

I DECIDED:

claims Joint Stock Company «YuniKredit Bank» to satisfy.

collect from Petrova FULL NAME8 in favor Joint Stock Company «YuniKredit Bank» payable under the credit agreement № DD.MM.YYYY as of DD.MM.YYYY in sum 1 471 482 (one million four seventy one thousand four eighty two) ruble 29 kopecks, including arrears principal – 1 396 100 (one million three hundred ninety six thousand one hundred) rubles 59 kopecks; Interest on the loan – 45 504 (forty five thousand five hundred four) ruble 34 penny; interest on overdue principal debt – 20 195 (twenty thousand one hundred ninety five) rubles 99 kopecks, penalty interest – 9 681 (nine thousand Six hundred eighty one ) ruble 37 kopecks.

collect from Petrova FULL NAME9 in favor Joint Stock Company «YuniKredit Bank» the cost of paying the state fee at the rate of 21 557 (twenty one thousand five hundred fifty seven) rubles 41 kopeck.

To foreclose on car Lexus RX350, vin №, 2013 year of release, color – black, owned by a Petrovu FULL NAME10, by sale at public auction with the establishment initial sale value of the property in executive production.

The decision can be appealed to the Perm regional court through Perm District Court of Perm region within one month from the date of manufacture of a court decision in the final form.
